title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-8.6 - Permit content and terms of issuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-8.6 - Permit content and terms of issuance

State Regulations

The permit content and terms of issuance for a NSR major
modification are set forth generally in Subpart 231-1 1 of this Part. In
addition, the following emission limitations, as applicable, shall be
established in a permit: (a) The
projected actual emissions or potential to emit, as appropriate, of each
applicable regulated NSR contaminant(s) for a proposed NSR major
modification. (b) Any BACT
limitations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
231-8.6

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/25/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
